description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

Community Gardens, Lloyd Square, Islington, London

TPO Reference:

T1 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T2 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T3 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T4 – Purple leafed plum of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T5 – Tree of Heaven of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T6 – Tree of Heaven of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T7 – Tree of Heaven of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T8 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T9 – Plum of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T10 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T13 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T14 – Plum of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T15 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T16 – Hawthorn of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T17 – Plum of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T18 – Robinia of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T20 – Plum of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T21 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
T24 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006


PO Number:

T110187

Work specifications:

1 x Lime (T1) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Crown reduce by up to 30%

1 x Lime (T2) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Fell

1 x Lime (T3) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Crown reduce by up to 30%

1 x Purple leafed plum (T4) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 5m above ground level over the road and 2m over the footpath

1 x Tree of Heaven (T5) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Crown reduce by up to 30%

1 x Tree of Heaven (T6) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Fell

1 x Tree of Heaven (T7) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
30% crown reduction

1 x Lime (T8) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Crown reduce by up to 30%

1 x Plum (T9) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Crown raise over the road to give 5m clearance

1 x Lime (T10) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Remove deadwood

1 x Lime (T13) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006
Re pollard at 6m
decision_conditions:
The authority requires the replacement planting of the following trees to account for the removal of the protected trees listed below:
T2 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006 – Replacement tree required 
 to be located in a similar location or  to be agreed in writing with the local planning authority; 
T6– Lime of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006 – Replacement tree required 
T17 – Plum of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006 – Replacement tree required 
T18 – Robinia of LBI TPO (NO.284) 2006 – Replacement tree required 
T17 Ash of LBI TPO (No.335) 2007 - Replacement tree required from the following list: Liriodendron tulipifera (Tulip Tree) or Liquidambar styraciflua (Sweet Gum) to be located in a similar location in the rear garden of 10 Northampton Park to be agreed in writing with the local planning authority

The replacement tree shall be planted within one planting season of the tree removals
